name: Buddha Tahoe
description: Buddha Tahoe is what you get when Big Buddha Seeds reverses Cali Connectionâ€™s Tahoe OG Kush to create their own rendition of this indica staple. Like its OG ancestors, Buddha Tahoe maintains a zesty lemon and earthy hash aroma typical of kush varieties. Potent and long-lasting, Buddha Tahoe launches you into to the highest level of cerebral euphoria which won this strain 3rd place in the 2011 High Times Cannabis Cup.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Sleepy, Uplifted, Insomnia, Pain, Stress, Headaches, Depression, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache, Dry Eyes
